content: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
author: Nelson Mandela

content: To iterate is human, to recurse divine.
author: Peter Deutsch

content: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

content: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

content: The work of today is the history of tomorrow, and we are its makers.
author: Juliette Gordon Low

content: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.
author: Alan Turing

content: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

content: Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming; feedback is the treatment.
author: Kent Beck

content: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: It ain't what you don't know that gets you into trouble. It's what you know for sure that just ain't so.
author: Mark Twain

content: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
author: Martin Fowler

content: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
author: Confucius

content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

content: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

content: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.
author: Leonard Nimoy
